home.title: Company AI, private by design
home.subtitle: Chat with your org's knowledge, projects, and files. Admins control access, limits, and models.
home.feature1: Private chats scoped to files and projects
home.feature2: Groups and member invites with role-based access
home.feature3: LLM connectors per chat with API key support
home.feature4: Token limits by day, week, month
home.comingSoon: Scaffolded foundation. Core flows and integrations are next.
